Difficulty.Name: Go Easy On Me
Difficulty.Description: If you can't beat this difficulty, you should make an easier one by peeking at the XML files.

Difficulty.Name: Normal
Difficulty.Description: Standard difficulty. Enemies have the proper amount of damage and health, and so do you.

Difficulty.Name: Hard
Difficulty.Description: Slightly unfair. Enemies do double health and have double damage, you have half of both.

Difficulty.Name: Impossible
Difficulty.Description: I don't think it's possible to beat this difficulty, but if you do, chances are you're at the top of the leaderboards.
